N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2371.3 - Designation and duties of the privacy compliance officer

State Regulations

The records access officer, as designated by the Commissioner
of Taxation and Finance pursuant to section
2370.2
of this Title, is hereby designated privacy compliance officer. The privacy
compliance officer shall: (1)
coordinate the department's and the Tax Commission's response to requests for
amendment or correction of records, with due regard, however, upon all
occasions to the secrecy provisions enumerated in the Tax Law; (2)
provide information and assistance to a
data subject concerning the nature and location of records and systems of
records which may contain personal information identifiable to such data
subject, with due regard, however, upon all occasions to the secrecy provisions
enumerated in the Tax Law; and
(3)
have the power to appoint, from personnel from within the department, a deputy
or deputies, according to need, to assist him in the coordination of responses
to requests for access to and/or amendment or correction of personal
records. Notes
